tu.darmstadt.de.swc.kombi.reader

Class GraphReader

  • java.lang.Object
    • tu.darmstadt.de.swc.kombi.reader.GraphReader

  • public class GraphReader
extends java.lang.Object
    Utility class for reading graphs from file.

    • Constructor Detail

      • GraphReader

        public GraphReader(java.lang.String inputGraph)
            throws java.lang.NumberFormatException,
                   java.io.IOException
        Creates a GraphReader object for the specified file. For a graph with n nodes, the input file should contain n lines. Each line should contain d+1 integers separated by whitespace, where d is the outdegree of the corresponding node. The first integer is the ID of the vertex, the rest are the IDs of the endpoints of the outgoing edges.
        Parameters:
        inputGraph - the name of the input file
        Throws:
        java.lang.NumberFormatException - Throws NumberFormatException
        java.io.IOException - Throws IOException

    • Method Detail

      • getGraph

        public int[][] getGraph()
        Returns the parsed graph in adjacency list representation. This stored graph is returned without cloning, so it should not be modified.
        Returns:
        the parsed graph

      • getVertexCount

        public int getVertexCount()
        Get the number of nodes in the graph.
        Returns:
        the number of nodes

      • getEdgeCount

        public int getEdgeCount()
        Get the number of edges in the graph.
        Returns:
        the number of edges

      • originalIdOf

        public int originalIdOf(int index)
        Get the original ID of the node at the specified index in the adjacency list representation.
        Parameters:
        index - The index of a node in the adjacency list
        Returns:
        the original ID (in the parsed file) of the node
